attributes.action: Don't Make London Apart Of The E.U
attributes.background: Britain Have now left the E.U, However Nicola Sturgeon Wants Scotland & London To Remain In The E.U. Scotland Are They Own Country But Dont Let London join the Eu as A Borough. What's Been Done Is Done.

rejection.details: If London were to become independent of the rest of the UK, it would be for the EU to decide whether it could join.
